```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
library(ggthemes)

df_1415 <- read.csv("data/epl/shots_epl_14-15.csv") %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>% 
  as_tibble()

theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

```{r}

df_1415 %>% 
  filter(lastAction %in% c("Pass", "Cross", "None", "Standard")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(minute, fill = lastAction)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 15, show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~lastAction)
  
  

```
